text: Hubert Reeves (July 13, 1932 – October 13, 2023) was a Canadian astrophysicist and popularizer of science. His career has lasted for nearly fifty years. He won many awards for his works including the Albert Einstein Award. Reeves was born in Montreal, Quebec. He studied at Collège Jean-de-Brébeuf. Reeves now lives in Paris, France. Reeves often spoke on television, promoting science. He resided in Paris, France, where he died on October 13, 2023, at the age of 91. ==Related pages== *List of astrophysicists == References == ==Other websites== * * Biography in English at science.ca Category:1932 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Canadian physicists Category:People from Montreal Category:Writers from Quebec
